title: Please help, i can't log in...
body: Not really sure whats going on but I keep getting this error message... My internet connection is fine and nothing has changed, I was playing earlier in the day. I've gotten this message before but whenever i restart my computer it usually works, now it's been doing this for a couple hours and nothing seems to work. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body: There were some [service issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/yjteaUkU-login-issues-all-regions-127) last night that was causing login problems.  Everything should be okay now!

My thread will help. Read chat. it was the same issue.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Bps5f2zp-anyones-client-not-working

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/7ct4ZEEU-connection-issue-solved-upvote-this-so-its-at-the-top-of-the-list

this thread shows you how to do a full repair on league, tested it out and it works

Same thing is happening to me. I played a normal blind pick game and then after the game ended which ran perfectly fine I clicked on either collection or store (not sure which one at this point of frustration) but my game popped up with that message so I closed the client tried to re-login and was still popping up. I restarted my pc and its still happening. I'm browsing the internet and can play other games online SO I am DEFINITLY connected to the internet. It doesn't even let you click on the settings tab on the top right to attempt a repair or anything. Very frustrating what is going on Riot?
I don't know what happened, but i downloaded that hextech repair tool and ran it, i was able to log in now. i ended up with a new client desktop logo to. Must have repatched the client or something.
can't log in either.. i was literally just playing then i went to switch clients and now i cant even log in.
